question: Which among the following statements is not correct about temperate cyclone?
option1: They are confined to 35 degree – 65 degree N and S of equator.
option2: They form only on seas with temperature more than 26-27 degree C
answer: They form only on seas with temperature more than 26-27 degree C
explanation: The Temperate Cyclones are also called as Extra Tropical Cyclones or Mid-Latitude Cyclones or Frontal Cyclones or Wave Cyclones. They can form both on land as well as seas. They are systems developing in the mid and high latitude (35° latitude and 65° latitude in both hemispheres), beyond the tropics. They cover a large area compared to the tropical cyclones. They are Inverted V shape.
